attacks.name: Featherblade
attacks.special: This Attack may be made against targets up to 2" away, even if they aren't in base contact. Attacks may still be amde if there is a friendly Character between this Character and the target.

attacks.name: Piercing Screech
attacks.special: Affects all Characters within 6" and ignores Armour and Shields. On a Critical Hit, the target's Move stat is halved for this Round. This does stack.
